scripts.Counter:increment: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method increment --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep ACCOUNT_1 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:getBoard:call: cast call --rpc-url https://testnet-rpc1.artela.network $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) "getBoard()" --private-key $(grep ACCOUNT_1_SK .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:getMyPosition:call: cast call --rpc-url https://testnet-rpc1.artela.network $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) "getMyPosition()" --private-key $(grep ACCOUNT_1_SK .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:moveUp: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[2]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_1 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:moveUp:call: cast call --rpc-url https://testnet-rpc1.artela.network $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) "move(uint8)" 2 --private-key $(grep ACCOUNT_1_SK .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:moveDown: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[0]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_1 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:moveLeft: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[1]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_1 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:moveRight: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[3]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_1 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:2:moveUp: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[2]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_2 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:2:moveDown: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[0]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_2 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:2:moveLeft: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[1]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_2 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.Counter:2:moveRight: node scripts/contract-send.cjs --method move --args '[3]' --abi ./contracts/build/contract/Counter.abi --contract $(grep CONTRACT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --pkfile $(grep ACCOUNT_2 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.aspect:build: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
scripts.build: npm run contract:build && npm run aspect:gen && npm run aspect:build
